arm_group.description: Patients received 1-3 Obalon Gastric Balloons over a period of 12 weeks

brief_summary.textblock:
The objective of this study is to evaluate the initial safety and preliminary effectiveness
      of the Obalon intragastric balloon system in European subjects with a BMI in the range of 27
      - 35 kg/m^2

clinical_study.brief_title: European Study to Evaluate Preliminary Safety and Efficacy of Multiple Obalon Gastric Balloons for 12 Weeks as an Aid for Weight Loss

study_pop.textblock:
Patients were selected from investigators' patient population and included patients with a
        BMI in the range of 27 - 35 kg/m^2

facility.name: Service D'exploration Functionelle Digestive, Hospital Edouard Harriot

clinical_study.official_title: Feasibility Study to Evaluate Preliminary Safety and Efficacy of Multiple Obalon Gastric Balloons for 12 Weeks as an Aid for Weight Loss

authority: France: Afssaps - Agence française de sécurité sanitaire des produits de santé (Saint-Denis)
Belgium: Federal Agency for Medicinal Products and Health Products

primary_outcome.measure: Percent Excess Weight Loss based on an ideal BMI of 25.

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective
